articles.author: Jeffrey Sonnenfeld, Steven Tian
articles.title: Why over 80% of America's top CEOs think Trump would be wrong not to pick Chris Waller for Fed chair - Fortune
articles.description: The dark-horse candidate may lack the White House network of other top contenders but he is perhaps the only one who can give Trump the rate cuts he wants.
articles.content: Since the founding of the Federal Reserve in 1914, the United States has had 16 Fed chairs, yet rarely has the selection of the nations central-bank leader captured such sustained media and political… [+5797 chars]
